meanings.definition: The bone of the lower jaw.
meanings.sent1: The dentist examined my jawbone to check for any issues.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally bumped my jawbone on the edge of the table.
meanings.sent3: The dog's favorite chew toy was a rubber jawbone.
meanings.sent4: Her jawbone clenched in frustration as she tried to open the stubborn jar lid.
meanings.sent5: The jawbone is a crucial part of the human skull structure.

meanings.definition: To hit or punch someone with the jawbone.
meanings.sent1: In the movie, the hero jawboned the villain to save the day.
meanings.sent2: He threatened to jawbone his opponent if they didn't back off.
meanings.sent3: The siblings playfully jawboned each other during their pillow fight.
meanings.sent4: The boxer jawboned his way to victory with his powerful punches.
meanings.sent5: She jawboned the bully who had been bothering her for weeks.

meanings.sent1: The politician loved to jawbone about his accomplishments.
meanings.sent2: She would often jawbone about her upcoming promotion at work.
meanings.sent3: The kids jawboned about who could jump the highest on the trampoline.
meanings.sent4: The coach jawboned the team into giving their best performance.
meanings.sent5: He jawboned his way through the negotiation, impressing everyone with his confidence.
